metadata.name: product
metadata.comment: Products sold or used in the manfacturing of sold products.

makeflag.name: makeflag
makeflag.comment: 0 = Product is purchased, 1 = Product is manufactured in-house.

finishedgoodsflag.name: finishedgoodsflag
finishedgoodsflag.comment: 0 = Product is not a salable item. 1 = Product is salable.

reorderpoint.name: reorderpoint
reorderpoint.comment: Inventory level that triggers a purchase order or work order.

sizeunitmeasurecode.name: sizeunitmeasurecode
sizeunitmeasurecode.comment: Unit of measure for Size column.

weightunitmeasurecode.name: weightunitmeasurecode
weightunitmeasurecode.comment: Unit of measure for Weight column.

daystomanufacture.name: daystomanufacture
daystomanufacture.comment: Number of days required to manufacture the product.

productline.name: productline
productline.comment: R = Road, M = Mountain, T = Touring, S = Standard

class.name: class
class.comment: H = High, M = Medium, L = Low

style.name: style
style.comment: W = Womens, M = Mens, U = Universal

productsubcategoryid.name: productsubcategoryid
productsubcategoryid.comment: Product is a member of this product subcategory. Foreign key to ProductSubCategory.ProductSubCategoryID.

productmodelid.name: productmodelid
productmodelid.comment: Product is a member of this product model. Foreign key to ProductModel.ProductModelID.

sellstartdate.name: sellstartdate
sellstartdate.comment: Date the product was available for sale.

sellenddate.name: sellenddate
sellenddate.comment: Date the product was no longer available for sale.

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: salesorderdetail
metadata.comment: Individual products associated with a specific sales order. See SalesOrderHeader.

salesorderid.name: salesorderid
salesorderid.comment: Primary key. Foreign key to SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderID.

salesorderdetailid.name: salesorderdetailid
salesorderdetailid.comment: Primary key. One incremental unique number per product sold.

carriertrackingnumber.name: carriertrackingnumber
carriertrackingnumber.comment: Shipment tracking number supplied by the shipper.

productid.name: productid
productid.comment: Product sold to customer. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

specialofferid.name: specialofferid
specialofferid.comment: Promotional code. Foreign key to SpecialOffer.SpecialOfferID.

unitprice.name: unitprice
unitprice.comment: Selling price of a single product.

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table
